name: Metriport
headline: Open-Source Universal API for Healthcare Data
description:
Metriport helps healthcare organizations access and manage comprehensive patient medical data.

Through a single integration, Metriport ensures clinical accuracy and completeness of medical information to providers, delivering comprehensive consolidated patient clinical data at the point-of-care. By standardizing, de-duplicating, consolidating, and hydrating the data with medical code crosswalking, providers get a rich understanding of their patients' medical histories through Metriport.

Metriport is the only open-source solution of its kind that offers all these integrations in a single platform, and standardizes complex data formats into industry standards such as FHIR and C-CDA.

As a developer-first, HIPAA and SOC 2 Type II compliant interoperability solution, Metriport is powering the next wave of innovators in healthcare, creating an internet for healthcare data.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:b2b; industry:digital-health; industry:healthcare; industry:api; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Dima Goncharov, Founder
founders.description: Dima Goncharov is a Co-Founder & CEO of Metriport, which he started with Colin Elsinga in 2021. Dima is a software engineer by trade with professional industry experience building everything from aerospace systems, to highly available cloud database services.

founders.name: Colin Elsinga, Founder
founders.description: Colin Elsinga is the co-founder and COO of Metriport, which he started with Dima Goncharov in 2021. Colin is a software engineer and designer with professional experience building consumer health apps.

# Comprehensive patient data at the point-of-care
## Medical API
![CommonWell Health Alliance logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/640037753d2fc719f7c01f8f_commonwell.png)
![Carequality logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64003782449b65b935ac1a55_carequality.png)
Metriport brings you data from the largest health information networks in the country, via a single open-source API. Access comprehensive EHR data for your patients in seconds, with FHIR R4, C-CDA, and PDF formats supported.
[Learn More](https://metriport.com/</medical>)
[Quickstart](https://metriport.com/<https:/docs.metriport.com/medical-api/getting-started/quickstart>)
![FHIR snomed example data](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/650ced26d6ebe9d903eed095_Screenshot%202023-09-21%20at%206.22.39%20PM.png)
![Metriport clinician dashboard view](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/6781ddf95ecbf825b80dc5a4_Screenshot%202025-01-10%20at%206.30.25%E2%80%AFPM.png)
## Provider Dashboard
![Apple Health logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64003782449b658944ac1a5f_apple-health.png)

![WHOOP logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64c06a8d2b95cbe3c8855406_6400001e1e36e14f278afcc7_WHOOP%20Circle%20Black.svg)
![Withings logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64c06a3e7f03861563485320_64000109cfe1c9077a939ec4_withings-p-500.png)
![Withings logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64c06a3e7f03861563485320_64000109cfe1c9077a939ec4_withings-p-500.png)
Leverage Metriport's provider dashboard for streamlined patient medical record access. Manage all your patients' documents in one place and gain insights into their clinical history through tools like Metriport's advanced [AI Medical Record Summaries](https://metriport.com/<https:/www.metriport.com/blog/introducing-ai-summaries>). No engineering required!
[Learn More](https://metriport.com/</dashboard>)
[Quickstart](https://metriport.com/<https:/docs.metriport.com/medical-api/getting-started/quickstart>)
![Metriport clinician dashboard view](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/6781ddf95ecbf825b80dc5a4_Screenshot%202025-01-10%20at%206.30.25%E2%80%AFPM.png)
## Complete Patient Histories
• Patient medical history• Conditions• Medications• Encounter notes• Lab results• Allergies
• Progress notes• Prescriptions• Imaging• Vitals• Risk assessment• Family medical history• & more!
[Book Demo](https://metriport.com/<https:/calendly.com/colinelsinga/metriport-intro>)
[Overview](https://metriport.com/<https:/docs.metriport.com/medical-api/fhir/overview>)

![Metriport athenaOne integration screenshot Medications](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/6721d03b5808297a408527c2_3.png)
## EHR Apps
![Apple Health logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64003782449b658944ac1a5f_apple-health.png)
![Google Fit logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64003782449b65295eac1a5c_google-fit.png)

![Withings logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64c06a3e7f03861563485320_64000109cfe1c9077a939ec4_withings-p-500.png)
Metriport provides seamless applications with major Electronic Health Record (EHR) systems, enabling healthcare providers to access and manage patient data efficiently. Our EHR apps support both embedded applications within the EHR workflow and automated data synchronization capabilities.
[athenaOne®](https://metriport.com/</athenahealth-integration>)
[Elation®](https://metriport.com/</elation-app>)
![Metriport athenaOne integration screenshot Medications](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/6721d03b5808297a408527c2_3.png)
# What our customers are saying
“Working with Metriport is exceptional — they provide engineering and onboarding support, and helped us automate our patient record retrieval efforts. Being able to get clinical notes in seconds has been tremendously helpful for our providers, allowing us to significantly improve our patient intake experience, and ultimately provide quicker treatment.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/650a5b9876491d31541c1d79_1553559911989.jpg)
### Victor Sadauskas
CEO at Kivo Health
"Integrating Metriport’s medical record summaries directly into our EHR has proven invaluable to our clinical team. Metriport goes above and beyond with depth of coverage, data quality, and normalization of the data provided. Metriport’s comprehensive resources have helped us scale by empowering our physicians to deliver best-in-class specialty care, while minimizing unnecessary administrative burdens."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/660b4ce80afcf48b4e73bf4c_1568343705216.jpeg)
### Mondana Ghias, MD
Co-Founder & CMO at Tono Health
[See Case Studies![Up arrow icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64bc7e7c913366cc343f4f15_arrow-up-right.svg)](https://metriport.com/</customers>)
# Who can use Metriport?
### Metriport currently serves organizations with a valid **Treatment purpose of use** **under HIPAA**. Only provider organizations with a valid **NPI number** , or **healthcare IT vendors** who sell to providers, are permitted to exchange data on the networks that Metriport participates in. If you're curious to know where your use case falls under, read [this federal guide](https://metriport.com/<https:/www.hhs.gov/sites/default/files/exchange_treatment.pdf>) on Treatment-based exchange.
# Best-in-Class Security
SOC 2 Type II
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64be05b9b6b02693f0555b81_Screenshot%202023-07-23%20at%2010.01.33%20PM.png)
HIPAA Compliant
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64be05b9b6b02693f0555b81_Screenshot%202023-07-23%20at%2010.01.33%20PM.png)
Externally Audited
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64be05b9b6b02693f0555b81_Screenshot%202023-07-23%20at%2010.01.33%20PM.png)
Fully Encrypted
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64be05b9b6b02693f0555b81_Screenshot%202023-07-23%20at%2010.01.33%20PM.png)
MFA
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64be05b9b6b02693f0555b81_Screenshot%202023-07-23%20at%2010.01.33%20PM.png)
VPN
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64be05b9b6b02693f0555b81_Screenshot%202023-07-23%20at%2010.01.33%20PM.png)
### Metriport[](https://metriport.com/<https:/www.vanta.com/>) is externally audited and uses Third Party Standards for automated compliance monitoring. We are a certified HIPAA and SOC 2 Type 2 compliant organization, and follow best industry-best practices such as MFA.
[Learn More](https://metriport.com/<https:/security.metriport.com/>)
# Why Open-Source?
Because open-source is the future of healthcare technology. Come check out our public Github repo today (and give us a ⭐️), or learn more via our blog.
[View on Github](https://metriport.com/<https:/github.com/metriport/metriport>)[Learn More](https://metriport.com/<https:/www.metriport.com/blog/open-sourcing-healthcare>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64bdf975d95372adf5467308_Screenshot%202023-07-23%20at%209.08.06%20PM.png)
Transparency
See what's under the hood with externally auditable source-code. No more blackboxes!
Reliability
Stay free of vendor lock-in, always maintaining the ability to self-host our code. Rely on our immortal code, not our business!
Collaboration
Leverage community contributions, or even build your own features on top of our code!
# Integrate in hours, not months
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64c07f687e8881a7471a5a59_headset-solid.svg)
### 24/7 Support
Get support within minutes, not days. We work around the clock to ensure you get the first-class customer support you deserve.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64c07fa64aa4f4832eadb51b_plug-circle-check-solid.svg)
### One Integration
Integrate once with our single API to get the data you need to grow and scale quickly. Avoid wrangling multiple integrations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64c080332b5a28e261ba6196_book-solid.svg)
### Developer Docs
Get everything you need to get up and running in our public docs, from Quickstart guides, to FHIR overview, and more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64c07f153cd3a8d0d1b77bcf_code-solid%20\(1\).svg)
### Open-Source Code
We're open-source, which means more transparency, reliability, and collaboration than any proprietary alternative. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64c0806d7a8f4e5e304b0cd0_npm.svg)
### SDK Packages
Our public developer SDKs allow you to get up and running with Metriport right away, making the integration process with our API seamless.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64c080762b5a28e261babf48_chart-line-solid.svg)
### Dashboard UI
Through the Metriport developer dashboard, you can get access to everything you need in one place: API keys, sandbox, and more.

Metriport provides seamless applications with major Electronic Health Record (EHR) systems, enabling healthcare providers to access and manage patient data efficiently. Our EHR apps support both embedded applications within the EHR workflow and automated data synchronization capabilities.
athenaOne®⟨7⟩
Elation®⟨8⟩
![Metriport athenaOne integration screenshot Medications⟨36⟩]
# What our customers are saying
“Working with Metriport is exceptional — they provide engineering and onboarding support, and helped us automate our patient record retrieval efforts. Being able to get clinical notes in seconds has been tremendously helpful for our providers, allowing us to significantly improve our patient intake experience, and ultimately provide quicker treatment.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/650a5b9876491d31541c1d79_1553559911989.jpg)
### Victor Sadauskas
CEO at Kivo Health
"Integrating Metriport’s medical record summaries directly into our EHR has proven invaluable to our clinical team. Metriport goes above and beyond with depth of coverage, data quality, and normalization of the data provided. Metriport’s comprehensive resources have helped us scale by empowering our physicians to deliver best-in-class specialty care, while minimizing unnecessary administrative burdens."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/660b4ce80afcf48b4e73bf4c_1568343705216.jpeg)
### Mondana Ghias, MD
Co-Founder & CMO at Tono Health
See Case Studies![Up arrow icon⟨21⟩](https://metriport.com/</customers>)
# Who can use Metriport?
### Metriport currently serves organizations with a valid **Treatment purpose of use** **under HIPAA**. Only provider organizations with a valid **NPI number** , or **healthcare IT vendors** who sell to providers, are permitted to exchange data on the networks that Metriport participates in. If you're curious to know where your use case falls under, read this federal guide⟨37⟩ on Treatment-based exchange.
# Best-in-Class Security
SOC 2 Type II
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64be05b9b6b02693f0555b81_Screenshot%202023-07-23%20at%2010.01.33%20PM.png)
HIPAA Compliant
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64be05b9b6b02693f0555b81_Screenshot%202023-07-23%20at%2010.01.33%20PM.png)
Externally Audited
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64be05b9b6b02693f0555b81_Screenshot%202023-07-23%20at%2010.01.33%20PM.png)
Fully Encrypted
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64be05b9b6b02693f0555b81_Screenshot%202023-07-23%20at%2010.01.33%20PM.png)
MFA
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64be05b9b6b02693f0555b81_Screenshot%202023-07-23%20at%2010.01.33%20PM.png)
VPN
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64be05b9b6b02693f0555b81_Screenshot%202023-07-23%20at%2010.01.33%20PM.png)
### Metriport[](https://metriport.com/<https:/www.vanta.com/>) is externally audited and uses Third Party Standards for automated compliance monitoring. We are a certified HIPAA and SOC 2 Type 2 compliant organization, and follow best industry-best practices such as MFA.
Learn More⟨11⟩
# Why Open-Source?
Because open-source is the future of healthcare technology. Come check out our public Github repo today (and give us a ⭐️), or learn more via our blog.
View on Github⟨38⟩Learn More⟨39⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64bdf975d95372adf5467308_Screenshot%202023-07-23%20at%209.08.06%20PM.png)
Transparency
See what's under the hood with externally auditable source-code. No more blackboxes!
Reliability
Stay free of vendor lock-in, always maintaining the ability to self-host our code. Rely on our immortal code, not our business!
Collaboration
Leverage community contributions, or even build your own features on top of our code!
# Integrate in hours, not months
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64c07f687e8881a7471a5a59_headset-solid.svg)
### 24/7 Support
Get support within minutes, not days. We work around the clock to ensure you get the first-class customer support you deserve.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64c07fa64aa4f4832eadb51b_plug-circle-check-solid.svg)
### One Integration
Integrate once with our single API to get the data you need to grow and scale quickly. Avoid wrangling multiple integrations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64c080332b5a28e261ba6196_book-solid.svg)
### Developer Docs
Get everything you need to get up and running in our public docs, from Quickstart guides, to FHIR overview, and more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64c07f153cd3a8d0d1b77bcf_code-solid%20\(1\).svg)
### Open-Source Code
We're open-source, which means more transparency, reliability, and collaboration than any proprietary alternative. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64c0806d7a8f4e5e304b0cd0_npm.svg)
### SDK Packages
Our public developer SDKs allow you to get up and running with Metriport right away, making the integration process with our API seamless.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/640036547d68f8c201789d8c/64c080762b5a28e261babf48_chart-line-solid.svg)
### Dashboard UI
Through the Metriport developer dashboard, you can get access to everything you need in one place: API keys, sandbox, and more.

generated_description:
**Meet Metriport: The Open-Source API Revolutionizing Healthcare Data**

**Overview**  
Founded in 2022 and born out of Y Combinator's Batch S22, Metriport is trailblazing the healthcare tech landscape from the heart of San Francisco. The company has a lean team of seven dedicated employees, driving its mission: to create an Open-Source Universal API for Healthcare Data. The goal? Simplifying access to comprehensive patient medical data for healthcare organizations.

**What They Do**  
Metriport emerged initially to help healthcare providers access and manage detailed patient medical histories. Through a single integration point, it ensures clinical accuracy and completeness, delivering a consolidated view of patient data right at the point-of-care. They standardize and de-duplicate data, and even "hydrate" it with medical coding crosswalks, so healthcare providers truly understand their patients' medical backgrounds.

Here’s the kicker: Metriport is the only open-source solution that combines all these capabilities in one platform. They transform complex data formats into industry standards, specifically FHIR and C-CDA, making the integration process smoother than ever.

**Developer-Centric Approach**  
Metriport is crafted with developers in mind. It's HIPAA and SOC 2 Type II compliant, which is critical for today’s healthcare landscape. The platform empowers innovators by effectively creating an "internet for healthcare data," ultimately streamlining access to patient information and paving the way for new healthcare advancements.

**Current Offerings**  
Metriport currently features three main products:  
1. **Medical API**: Access comprehensive patient data in seconds. This API is FHIR-native and ensures interoperability with the largest health information networks.
2. **Provider Dashboard**: A no-code dashboard designed for healthcare providers to manage all their patient documents and gain insights without needing engineering expertise.
3. **FHIR Converter**: Simplifies the integration of different healthcare data formats.

In addition to its core tools, Metriport boasts seamless integration with major EHR systems like athenaOne and Elation, ensuring that patient data is always available when needed.

**Privacy & Security**  
Metriport takes security seriously. Being HIPAA compliant and SOC 2 Type II verified, they're dedicated to upholding the highest standards for data safety. With advanced measures—like multi-factor authentication and encryption—they ensure that both organizations and patients can trust their data is secure.

**Why Open-Source?**  
Metriport believes that open-source is the way forward for healthcare technology. By fostering transparency, reliability, and collaboration, the platform invites community contributions and allows organizations to self-host its code. This freedom means no vendor lock-in, ensuring that innovative solutions can grow organically.

**Future Outlook**  
As Metriport continues to develop its offerings, it's positioning itself as an indispensable tool for healthcare organizations seeking to become more agile and data-driven. This isn't just about having a slick API; it's about reshaping how patient data is accessed, managed, and utilized across the healthcare ecosystem.

For more details, check out [Metriport's website](https://metriport.com/) and see how they’re making waves in the healthcare data space. If you're a developer or healthcare provider looking to simplify your data needs, a demo might be just what you need. 

In a world where timely access to healthcare data can significantly impact patient outcomes, Metriport is poised to lead the charge toward a more integrated, efficient future.
